name: Default List Splitter
helpText:
Default List Splitter

  • Input- A list of 1 to n objects (see ‘fromType’ e.g. String)
  • Output- 1 to n separate messages, each message containing one of the objects
Input  Output 
MessagePayload MessagePayload
1“AA”, “BB”, “CC” 1“AA”
   2“BB”
   3“CC”

componentName.helpText: The name of the component as displayed on diagrams, space are encouraged, succinct is best. The name should be unique for the flow. The name will be used internally to reflect the bean created.
